summary: Camera Light Culling in Electrical Room Corner
description: In the electrical room, the light source around the camera is culled (disappears) when the player stands in the far-right corner of the room.
steps: 2. Open the door to the electrical room.
3. Walk up to the camera to observe the light.
4. Walk to the far-most right corner of the room.
5. Observe the light around the camera.
expected: The light around the camera should remain visible from all angles within the room.
actual: The light is culled and disappears when standing in the far-right corner.
